content: description i love wrapping up in a long and cozy cardigan first thing in the morning the morning mug cardigan is perfect for just that this cardigan has a long length and a stretchy stitch the oversized cuffed sleeves and large pockets give it that comfy feel this pattern is free on my blog 1 this cardigan is available as a kit with lion brand 2 the kit comes with all the yarn you need to make your cardigan plus a free copy of the printable pdf pattern you can even customize your yarn color i have a full video tutorial available 3 for this pattern on my youtube channel 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-morning-mug-cardigan/ 2 http //shrsl com/3xwyc 3 https //youtu be/flwxqsf4xba
